arts.ttl: George Lloyd scores winner as 10-man Shrewsbury hit back to beat Mansfield
arts.sum: Toto Nsiala was sent off for the hosts.

arts.ttl: Former Shrewsbury Town keeper faces lengthy spell out injured
arts.sum: The former Salop number one was not the only Cambridge player to pick an injury in the game, Zeno Ibsen Rossi could also be facing a spell out of the team. Marosi sustained a hamstring injury playing for Gary Monk's side last weekend against Mansfield - the team Shrewsbury come up against on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Gareth Ainsworth reveals why recruitment has been so challenging for Shrewsbury Town
arts.sum: The head coach revealed Salop missed out on a couple of targets on Wednesday as they try to strengthen their squad before deadline day. I want to bring a couple of players here, especially ones that probably know me, and know the way I play.
